rules.description: Option+A/O/U to Ä/Ö/Ü (For US keyboard if you want to use German umlauts)
Y, Z => Z, Y (For US keyboard if you want the German keyboard layout)
Left Ctrl => Command (Except in Terminal, TeamViewer, AnyDesk, RDP clients, etc.)
Option+Tab => Command+Tab (Except in Terminal, TeamViewer, AnyDesk, RDP clients, etc.)
Option+Backtick => Command+Backtick (Except in Terminal, TeamViewer, AnyDesk, RDP clients, etc.)
Left Command+Right Command (Only escape if pressed at the same time)
Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V, Ctrl+X => Command+C (Copy), Command+V (Paste), Command+X (Cut)
Ctrl+A => Command+A (Select all)
Ctrl+S => Command+S (Save)
Ctrl+N => Command+N (New)
Ctrl+F => Command+F (Find)
Ctrl+W => Command+W (Close)
Alt+F4 => Command+Q (Exit application)
Home => Command+Left Arrow (Move cursor to beginning of line)
Shift+Home => Command+Shift+Left Arrow (Move cursor to beginning of line with selection)
Ctrl+Home, Ctrl+Shift+Home => Command+Up Arrow, Command+Shift+Up Arrow (Move cursor to beginning of file with and without selection)
End => Command+Right Arrow (Move cursor to end of line)
Shift+End => Command+Shift+Right Arrow (Move cursor to end of line with selection)
Ctrl+End, Ctrl+Shift+End => Command+Down Arrow, Command+Shift+Down Arrow (Move cursor to end of file with and without selection)
Ctrl+T => Command+T (New tab)
Ctrl+B => Command+B (Bold)
Ctrl+I => Command+I (Italic)
Ctrl+L => Command+L (Open url location) (Only in browsers)
Ctrl+R => Command+R (Reload) (Only in browsers)
Ctrl+Tab => Command+Tab (Switch application)
Command+Tab => Command+Alt+0 (Reassigned command for opening Mission control)
Ctrl+(Shift)+Right/Left Arrow => Alt+(Shift)+Right/Left Arrow (Move cursor one word with selection and without selection)
Ctrl+Up/Down Arrow => Up/Down Arrow (Move cursor)
Command+L => Logout (CGSession -suspend)
Ctrl+Esc => Open Launchpad
Ctrl+Shift+Esc => Open Activity Monitor
Delete => Command+Backspace (Delete) (Only in Finder)
Button 4, 5 => Back, Forward (Only in Finder)
Ctrl+Left Click => Command+Left Click (Select multiple items)
Ctrl+Y, Ctrl+Z => Command+Shift+Y, Command+Z (Redo & Undo)
Left Option+Left Shift => < (Non US Backslash) (For US keyboard while using German layout)
Left Option+Z => < (Non US Backslash) (For US keyboard while using German layout)
Right Control+Z => | (Non US Backslash) (For US keyboard while using German layout)
2x Right/Left-Shift => ~/ (Only in Terminal and iTerm)
F2 => Return (Rename) (Only in Finder)
Right Control+F1 (Screenshot of the selected area) (Desktop)
Right Control+F2 (Screenshot of the selected area) (Clipboard)
Right Control+F3 (Screenshot options)
F5 => Command+R (Reload)
F5 => Command+Shift+M (Mute microphone in Zoom or Microsoft Teams)

to.shell_command: if [ $(ps aux | grep -v grep | grep -ci "Microsoft Teams.app/Contents/Frameworks/Microsoft Teams Helper.app") -gt 0 ]; then osascript -e 'activate application id "com.microsoft.teams"' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "m" using {command down, shift down}'; fi & if [ $(ps aux | grep -v grep | grep -ci "zoom.us.app/Contents/Frameworks/cpthost.app/Contents/MacOS/CptHost") -gt 0 ]; then osascript -e 'activate application id "us.zoom.xos"' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "a" using {command down, shift down}'; fi

rules.description: F12 => iTerm (Show and hide iTerm)
Ctrl+F12 => Dev Tools (For all type of browsers)
Scroll-Lock => Ctrl+Command+Q
